description: These fritters made in a pie maker are perfect to make with any leftover vegetables you may have in the fridge.
name: Cauliflower Cheese and Bacon Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place florets in food processor and blitz until like cauliflower rice. Transfer to large bowl.
Add garlic, onion flakes, zucchini, bacon, cheese and flour, and mix well to combine.

Beat eggs with a fork in a small bowl, season with salt and pepper. Add eggs along with 1/4 cup of water to the cauliflower mix and stir. Gradually add remaining water (or add more or less) to achieve a thick batter.
Heat up pie maker as per instructions. Drop approx 1/4 cup of mixture into holes, close lid and cook for approx 5 minutes. Open lid, flip fritters pover, then close lid and cook a further 5 minutes.
Remove from pie maker and let rest on plate with paper towel. Made approx 16 "fritters" (I lost count after I ate the first few).
